verses.verse: Then Eliashib <WH475> the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548> rose <WH6965> up with his brothers <WH251> the priests, <WH3548> and they built <WH1129> the sheep <WH6629> gate; <WH8179> they sanctified <WH6942> it, and set <WH5975> up the doors <WH1817> of it; even to the tower <WH4026> of Meah <WH3968> they sanctified <WH6942> it, to the tower <WH4026> of Hananeel. <WH2606>
And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to him built <WH1129> the men <WH582> of Jericho. <WH3405> And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to them built <WH1129> Zaccur <WH2139> the son <WH1121> of Imri. <WH566>

But the fish <WH1709> gate <WH8179> did the sons <WH1121> of Hassenaah <WH5574> build, <WH1129> who <WH1992> also laid the beams <WH7136> thereof, and set <WH5975> up the doors <WH1817> thereof, the locks <WH4514> thereof, and the bars <WH1280> thereof.

And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to them repaired <WH2388> Meremoth <WH4822> the son <WH1121> of Urijah, <WH223> the son <WH1121> of Koz. <WH6976> And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to them repaired <WH2388> Meshullam <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Berechiah, <WH1296> the son <WH1121> of Meshezabeel. <WH4898> And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to them repaired <WH2388> Zadok <WH6659> the son <WH1121> of Baana. <WH1195>
And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to them the Tekoites <WH8621> repaired; <WH2388> but their nobles <WH117> put <WH935> not their necks <WH6677> to the work <WH5656> of their LORD. <WH113>

Moreover the old <WH3465> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> Jehoiada <WH3111> the son <WH1121> of Paseah, <WH6454> and Meshullam <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Besodeiah; <WH1152> they laid the beams <WH7136> thereof, and set <WH5975> up the doors <WH1817> thereof, and the locks <WH4514> thereof, and the bars <WH1280> thereof.

And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to them repaired <WH2388> Melatiah <WH4424> the Gibeonite, <WH1393> and Jadon <WH3036> the Meronothite, <WH4824> the men <WH582> of Gibeon, <WH1391> and of Mizpah, <WH4709> to the throne <WH3678> of the governor <WH6346> on this side <WH5676> the river. <WH5104>

Next <WH5921> <WH3027> to him repaired <WH2388> Uzziel <WH5816> the son <WH1121> of Harhaiah, <WH2736> of the goldsmiths. <WH6884> Next <WH5921> <WH3027> to him also repaired <WH2388> Hananiah <WH2608> the son <WH1121> of one of the apothecaries, <WH7543> and they fortified <WH5800> Jerusalem <WH3389> to the broad <WH7342> wall. <WH2346>
And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to them repaired <WH2388> Rephaiah <WH7509> the son <WH1121> of Hur, <WH2354> the ruler <WH8269> of the half <WH2677> part <WH6418> of Jerusalem. <WH3389>

And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to them repaired <WH2388> Jedaiah <WH3042> the son <WH1121> of Harumaph, <WH2739> even over <WH5048> against <WH5048> his house. <WH1004> And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to him repaired <WH2388> Hattush <WH2407> the son <WH1121> of Hashabniah. <WH2813>

Malchijah <WH4441> the son <WH1121> of Harim, <WH2766> and Hashub <WH2815> the son <WH1121> of Pahathmoab, <WH6355> repaired <WH2388> the other <WH8145> piece, <WH4060> and the tower <WH4026> of the furnaces. <WH8574>

And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to him repaired <WH2388> Shallum <WH7967> the son <WH1121> of Halohesh, <WH3873> the ruler <WH8269> of the half <WH2677> part <WH6418> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> he and his daughters. <WH1323>

The valley <WH1516> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> Hanun, <WH2586> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Zanoah; <WH2182> they built <WH1129> it, and set <WH5975> up the doors <WH1817> thereof, the locks <WH4514> thereof, and the bars <WH1280> thereof, and a thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520> on the wall <WH2346> to the dung <WH830> gate. <WH8179>

But the dung <WH830> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> Malchiah <WH4441> the son <WH1121> of Rechab, <WH7394> the ruler <WH8269> of part <WH6418> of Bethhaccerem; <WH1021> he built <WH1129> it, and set <WH5975> up the doors <WH1817> thereof, the locks <WH4514> thereof, and the bars <WH1280> thereof.

But the gate <WH8179> of the fountain <WH5869> repaired <WH2388> Shallun <WH7968> the son <WH1121> of Colhozeh, <WH3626> the ruler <WH8269> of part <WH6418> of Mizpah; <WH4709> he built <WH1129> it, and covered <WH2926> it, and set <WH5975> up the doors <WH1817> thereof, the locks <WH4514> thereof, and the bars <WH1280> thereof, and the wall <WH2346> of the pool <WH1295> of Siloah <WH7975> by the king's <WH4428> garden, <WH1588> and to the stairs <WH4609> that go <WH3381> down <WH3381> from the city <WH5892> of David. <WH1732>

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Nehemiah <WH5166> the son <WH1121> of Azbuk, <WH5802> the ruler <WH8269> of the half <WH2677> part <WH6418> of Bethzur, <WH1049> to the place over <WH5048> against <WH5048> the sepulchers <WH6913> of David, <WH1732> and to the pool <WH1295> that was made, <WH6213> and to the house <WH1004> of the mighty. <WH1368>

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> the Levites, <WH3881> Rehum <WH7348> the son <WH1121> of Bani. <WH1137> Next <WH5921> <WH3027> to him repaired <WH2388> Hashabiah, <WH2811> the ruler <WH8269> of the half <WH2677> part <WH6418> of Keilah, <WH7084> in his part. <WH6418>
After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> their brothers, <WH251> Bavai <WH942> the son <WH1121> of Henadad, <WH2582> the ruler <WH8269> of the half <WH2677> part <WH6418> of Keilah. <WH7084>

And next <WH5921> <WH3027> to him repaired <WH2388> Ezer <WH5829> the son <WH1121> of Jeshua, <WH3442> the ruler <WH8269> of Mizpah, <WH4709> another <WH8145> piece <WH4060> over <WH5048> against <WH5048> the going <WH5927> up to the armory <WH5402> at the turning <WH4740> of the wall.

After <WH310> him Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Zabbai <WH2079> earnestly <WH2734> repaired <WH2388> the other <WH8145> piece, <WH4060> from the turning <WH4740> of the wall to the door <WH6607> of the house <WH1004> of Eliashib <WH475> the high <WH1419> priest. <WH3548>

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Meremoth <WH4822> the son <WH1121> of Urijah <WH223> the son <WH1121> of Koz <WH6976> another <WH8145> piece, <WH4060> from the door <WH6607> of the house <WH1004> of Eliashib <WH475> even to the end <WH8503> of the house <WH1004> of Eliashib. <WH475>
And after <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> the priests, <WH3548> the men <WH582> of the plain. <WH3603>

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Benjamin <WH1144> and Hashub <WH2815> over <WH5048> against <WH5048> their house. <WH1004> After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Maaseiah <WH4641> the son <WH1121> of Ananiah <WH6055> by his house. <WH1004>

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Binnui <WH1131> the son <WH1121> of Henadad <WH2582> another <WH8145> piece, <WH4060> from the house <WH1004> of Azariah <WH5838> to the turning <WH4740> of the wall, even to the corner. <WH6438>

Palal <WH6420> the son <WH1121> of Uzai, <WH186> over <WH5048> against <WH5048> the turning <WH4740> of the wall, and the tower <WH4026> which lies <WH3318> out from the king's <WH4428> high <WH5945> house, <WH1004> that was by the court <WH2691> of the prison. <WH4307> After <WH310> him Pedaiah <WH6305> the son <WH1121> of Parosh. <WH6551>

Moreover the Nethinims <WH5411> dwelled <WH3427> in Ophel, <WH6077> to the place over <WH5048> against <WH5048> the water <WH4325> gate <WH8179> toward the east, <WH4217> and the tower <WH4026> that lies <WH3318> out.

After <WH310> them the Tekoites <WH8621> repaired <WH2388> another <WH8145> piece, <WH4060> over <WH5048> against <WH5048> the great <WH1419> tower <WH4026> that lies <WH3318> out, even to the wall <WH2346> of Ophel. <WH6077>
From above the horse <WH5483> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> the priests, <WH3548> every <WH376> one <WH376> over <WH5048> against <WH5048> his house. <WH1004>

After <WH310> them repaired <WH2388> Zadok <WH6659> the son <WH1121> of Immer <WH564> over <WH5048> against <WH5048> his house. <WH1004> After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> also Shemaiah <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Shechaniah, <WH7935> the keeper <WH8104> of the east <WH4217> gate. <WH8179>

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Hananiah <WH2608> the son <WH1121> of Shelemiah, <WH8018> and Hanun <WH2586> the sixth <WH8345> son <WH1121> of Zalaph, <WH6764> another <WH8145> piece. <WH4060> After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Meshullam <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Berechiah <WH1296> over <WH5048> against <WH5048> his chamber. <WH5393>

After <WH310> him repaired <WH2388> Malchiah <WH4441> the goldsmith's <WH6885> son <WH1121> to the place <WH1004> of the Nethinims, <WH5411> and of the merchants, <WH7402> over <WH5048> against <WH5048> the gate <WH8179> Miphkad, <WH4663> and to the going <WH5944> up of the corner. <WH6438>
And between <WH996> the going <WH5944> up of the corner <WH6438> to the sheep <WH6629> gate <WH8179> repaired <WH2388> the goldsmiths <WH6884> and the merchants. <WH7402>
